meanings.definition: The act of intentionally causing one's own death.
meanings.sent1: After feeling very sad, John tragically committed suicide.
meanings.sent2: The news reported a suicide in the local community.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a note next to the suicide, saying 'I'll be back.'
meanings.sent4: The abandoned building was a haunting reminder of the city's suicide.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the character's suicide as a heartbreaking moment.

meanings.definition: A person who has killed themselves intentionally.
meanings.sent1: The suicide's family mourned their loss deeply.
meanings.sent2: The psychologist studied the behavior of a suicide.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, someone dressed up as a suicide with a fake knife.
meanings.sent4: The history book mentioned a famous political suicide from ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the struggles faced by a suicide.
